creditline: Gift of Tamara and Michael Root
description: teapot (a) with mostly brown and tan glazing; some green glaze on bottom near foot; darker brown speckles at top of teapot, near opening; vertical cactus-shapes in white glazing form a repeating pattern; same shapes on lid (b); globular body with S-curved spout and flared handle on opposite side; narrower round foot; lid is round with a crenulated knob on top
title: Teapot
